subject: Urgent: Submit your expense reports
body: Hi Team, Please ensure all travel expense reports for October are submitted by EOD tomorrow. Failure to do so will delay reimbursement.

subject: Weekly Tech Roundup: AI Agents on the Rise
body: Top stories this week: 1. The rise of autonomous agents. 2. Python 3.13 released. 3. New CSS features for 2025. Click here to read more.

subject: Project Sync - Next Steps
body: Hi Pranay, Can we hop on a quick call tomorrow at 2 PM to discuss the deployment timeline? Also, please send me the latest architecture diagram before the meeting.

subject: You have been selected for a $5000 cash prize!
body: Congratulations! You are our lucky winner. Click the link below to claim your prize immediately. Limited time offer!

subject: Updates on the Astrochemistry ML paper
body: Hey, I finished the data cleaning part. Can you review the model training script? We need to submit the draft by Friday.

subject: [JIRA] New Issue Assigned: Fix Login Bug
body: A new issue has been assigned to you. Issue #402: Login page crashes on mobile view. Priority: High. Please fix this by Wednesday.

subject: Invitation: Developer Mixer this Saturday
body: Join us for drinks and code this Saturday at the Downtown Hub. RSVP required.

subject: Lab evaluation
body: Bro, are you done with the Windows Registry assignment? I'm stuck on the hive analysis part. Let me know if you're free to help.

subject: Security Alert: New sign-in detected
body: We noticed a new sign-in to your account from a Linux device in Kochi, India. If this was you, you can ignore this message.

subject: Your package has been delivered
body: Your order #404-1234567-1234567 has been delivered. Handed to resident.
